commit.message:
re PR ipa/65028 (450.soplex in SPEC CPU 2006 is miscompiled)


	PR ipa/65028
	* ipa-inline-transform.c (mark_all_inlined_calls_cdtor): New function.
	(inline_call): Use it.

From-SVN: r220693
